lines.line: Hello.
Well hello stranger. My name's Bolren, I'm the king of the tree gnomes.
I'm surprised you made it in, maybe I made the maze too easy.
Maybe.
I'm afraid I have more serious concerns at the moment. Very serious.
Can I help at all?
I'm glad you asked.
The truth is my people are in grave danger. We have always been protected by the Spirit Tree. No creature of dark can harm us while its three orbs are in place.
We are not a violent race, but we fight when we must. Many gnomes have fallen battling the dark forces of Khazard to the North.
We became desperate, so we took one orb of protection to the battlefield. It was a foolish move.
Khazard troops seized the orb. Now we are completely defenceless.
How can I help?
You would be a huge benefit on the battlefield. If you would go there and try to retrieve the orb, my people and I will be forever grateful.
I would be glad to help.
Thank you. The battlefield is to the north of the maze. Commander Montai will inform you of their current situation.
That is if he's still alive.
My assistant shall guide you out. Good luck friend, try your best to return the orb
We're out of the maze now. Please hurry, we must have the orb if we are to survive.
I'm sorry but I won't be involved.
Ok then, travel safe.
I'll leave you to it then.
Ok, take care.
Hello Elkoy.
Oh my! Oh my!
What's wrong?
The orb, they have the orb. We're doomed. Do you need me to show you through the maze?
Yes please.
Please help us get our orb back.
Not now, thanks.
The orb, they have the orb. We're doomed. Do you need me to show you back to the village?
Oh my, oh my!
The orb, they have the orb. It must be returned or we're doomed.
Hello, how are you?
Oh my. I'll never find my way back before Khazard's men come and hunt me down.
Hello Bolren.
Hello traveller, we must retrieve the orb. It's being held by Khazard troops north of here.
Ok, I'll try my best.
The orb is being held at the battlefield north of the maze.
Hello traveller, are you here to help or just to watch?
I've been sent by King Bolren to retrieve the orb of protection.
Excellent we need all the help we can get.
I'm commander Montai. The orb is in the Khazard stronghold to the north, but until we weaken their defences we can't get close.
What can I do?
Firstly we need to strengthen our own defences. We desperately need wood to make more battlements, once the battlements are gone it's all over. Six loads of normal logs should do it.
Sorry I no longer want to be involved.
That's a shame, we could have done with your help.
Ok, I'll gather some wood.
Please be as quick as you can, I don't know how much longer we can hold out.
I can't talk now. Can't you see we're trying to win a battle here?
Hi there.
The battle is far from over. If you have a pure heart you will help us win.
I can't stand this war. The misery, the pain, it's driving me crazy! When will it end?
Don't speak to me you insignificant wretch! Die in the name of Khazard!
You must retrieve the orb, or the gnome village is doomed. Do you need me to show you through the maze?
Hello again, we're still desperate for wood soldier. We need six loads of normal logs.
I'll see what I can do.
Thank you.
Hello again, we're still desperate for wood soldier.
I have some here. (You give six loads of logs to the commander.)
That's excellent, now we can make more defensive battlements.  Give me a moment to organise the troops and then come speak to me. I'll inform you of our next phase of attack.
How are you doing Montai?
We're hanging in there soldier. For the next phase of our attack we need to breach their stronghold.
The ballista can break through the stronghold wall, and then we can advance and seize back the orb.
So what's the problem?
From this distance we can't get an accurate enough shot.  We need the correct coordinates of the stronghold for a direct hit.  I've sent out three tracker gnomes to gather them.
Have they returned?
I'm afraid not, and we're running out of time. I need you to go into the heart of the battlefield, find the trackers, and bring back the coordinates.
Do you think you can do it?
No, I've had enough of your battle.
I understand, this isn't your fight.
I'll try my best.
Thank you, you're braver than most.
I don't know how long I will be able to hold out. Once you have the coordinates come back and fire the ballista right into those monsters.
If you can retrieve the orb and bring safety back to my people, none of the blood spilled on this field will be in vain.
Hello warrior. We need the coordinates for a direct hit from the ballista. Once you have a direct hit you will be able to enter the stronghold and retrieve the orb.
Do you know the coordinates of the Khazard stronghold?
I managed to get one, although it wasn't easy.
Well done.
The other two tracker gnomes should have the other coordinates if they're still alive.
OK, take care.
Are you OK?
They caught me spying on the stronghold. They beat and tortured me.
But I didn't crack. I told them nothing. They can't break me!
I'm sorry little man.
Don't be. I have the position of the stronghold!
Now leave before they find you and all is lost.
Hang in there.
Go!
OK? Who's OK? Not me! Hee hee!
You can't see me, no one can. Monsters, demons, they're all around me!
What do you mean?
They're dancing, all of them, hee hee.
Do you have the coordinate for the Khazard stronghold?
Who holds the stronghold?
What?
Less than my hands.
More than my head, less than my fingers.
More than we, less than our feet.
My legs and your legs, ha ha ha!
You're mad.
Dance with me, and Khazard's men are beat.
I'll pray for you little man.
All day we pray in the hay, hee hee.
That tracker gnome was a bit vague about the x coordinate! What could it be?
Evidently that wasn't the right x coordinate.
I've breached the stronghold.
I saw, that was a beautiful sight. The Khazard troops didn't know what hit them.
Now is the time to retrieve the orb. It's all in your hands. I'll be praying for you.
Hello again.
Well done, you've broken down their defences. This battle must be ours.
Well done, you've broken down their defences. This battle must be ours.
Don't talk to me, you can't see me. No one can, just the demons.
Don't even think of taking the orb!
Oi! You! Get out of there.
I have the orb of protection.
Incredible, for a human you really are something.
Thanks... I think!
I'll stay here with my troops and try and hold Khazard's men back. You return the orb to the gnome village. Go as quick as you can, the village is still unprotected.
How are you tracker?
Now we have the orb I'm much better. They won't stand a chance without it.
Now we have the orb I'm much better. Soon my comrades will come and free me.
You're back! And the orb?
No, I'm afraid not.
Please, we must have the orb if we are to survive. Do you need me to show you through the maze?
Hello Remsai.
Hello, did you find the orb?
Please, we must have the orb if we are to survive.
Do you have the orb?
Please, we must have the orb if we are to survive.
I have it here.
You're our saviour. Please return it to the village and we are all saved. Would you like me to show you the way to the village?
Here we are. Take the orb to King Bolren, I'm sure he'll be pleased to see you.
No thanks Elkoy.
Please, we must have the orb if we are to survive.
Hello Elkoy. I have the orb.
Take it to King Bolren, I'm sure he'll be pleased to see you.
Can you show me out of the village?
Please return with our orb soon.
Okay.
You're our saviour.
Hello little man.
Little man stronger than big man. Hee hee, lardi dee, lardi da.
Amazing, you recovered the orb.
Well I am impressed. Would you like to buy something?
I have the orb.
Oh my... The misery, the horror!
King Bolren, are you OK?
Thank you traveller, but it's too late. We're all doomed.
What happened?
They came in the night. I don't know how many, but enough.
Who?
Khazard troops. They slaughtered anyone who got in their way. Women, children, my wife.
I'm sorry.
They took the other orbs, now we are defenceless.
Where did they take them?
They headed north of the stronghold. A warlord carries the orbs.
I will find the warlord and bring back the orbs.
You are brave, but this task will be tough even for you. I wish you the best of luck. Once again you are our only hope.
I will safeguard this orb and pray for your safe return. My assistant will guide you out.
Good luck friend.
I'm sorry but I can't help
I understand, this isn't your battle.
Did you hear?
Khazard's men have pillaged the village! They slaughtered many, and took the other orbs in an attempt to lead us out of the maze. When will the misery end?
Please help us find the orbs.
I'm very sorry.
Would you like me to show you the way to the village?
Here we are. Despite what has happened here, I hope you feel welcome.
Ok then, take care.
Are you ok?
Khazard's men came. Without the orb we were defenceless. They killed many and then took our last hope, the other orbs.
Now surely we're all doomed. Without them the spirit tree is useless.
Hello there.
Oh my, oh my, the village has been pillaged and I'm still lost. Oh dear.
Hi.
Must save the orbs and kill the Khazard warlord. That will be fun, hee hee.
Hello Montai, how are you?
I'm ok, this battle is going to take longer to win than I expected. The Khazard troops won't give up even without the orb.
Oh, hello there. Have you heard? They took the other orbs, it's terrible. I suppose the show must go on.
Would you like to buy something?
When will this battle end? I feel like I've been fighting forever.
When will this battle end? I feel like I've been locked up my whole life.
I feel dizzy, where am I? Oh dear, oh dear I need some rest.
I think you do.
You think you're so clever. You know nothing!
I'll crush you and those pesky little green men!
You there, stop!
Go back to your pesky little green friends.
I've come for the orbs.
You're out of your depth traveller. These orbs are part of a much larger picture.
They're stolen goods, now give them here!
Ha, you really think you stand a chance? I'll crush you.
Bah, enough of you!
I thought I killed you?
Fool, warriors blessed by Khazard don't die. You can't kill that which is already dead. However I can kill you!
You truly are a hero.
Thanks.
You saved us by returning the orbs of protection. I'm humbled and wish you well.
Would you like me to show you the way to the village?
Here we are. Feel free to have a look around.
You saved us by returning the orbs of protection. I'm humbled and wish you well. Would you like me to show you through the maze?
Here we are. Have a safe journey.
I've returned.
You're back, well done brave adventurer. Now the orbs are safe we can perform the ritual for the spirit tree. We can live in peace once again.
Hello gnome.
Soon we're gonna have the sacred ceremony and boy am I going to party. Lock up your daughters. Hee hee.
Hello. I hope they come out and find me soon. It's getting cold.
Hello there. You're that hero who saved the orbs. Soon we will perform the ritual and the village will be safe again.
Anyway, would you like anything from my shop?
Bolren, I have returned.
You made it back! Do you have the orbs?
Please, we must have the orbs if we are to survive.
I have them here.
Hooray, you're amazing. I didn't think it was possible but you've saved us.
Once the orbs are replaced we will be safe once more. We must begin the ceremony immediately.
What does the ceremony involve?
The spirit tree has looked over us for centuries. Now we must pay our respects.
Su tana.
En tania.
Now at last my people are safe once more. We can live in peace again.
I'm pleased I could help.
You are modest brave traveller.
Please, for your efforts take this amulet. It's made from the same sacred stone as the orbs of protection. It will help keep you safe on your journeys.
Thank you King Bolren.
The tree has many other powers, some of which I cannot reveal. As a friend of the gnome people, I can now allow you to use the tree's magic to teleport to other trees grown from related seeds.

characters.name: Bolkoy
characters.description: Adult male gnome, British accent, friendly and cheerful tone, a shopkeeper who runs the village general store and maintains optimism despite the hardships his village faces.

characters.name: Commander Montai
characters.description: Middle-aged male gnome, British military accent, commanding and determined tone, a seasoned battlefield commander who wears a red helmet and directs the gnome forces against Khazard's army.

characters.name: Elkoy
characters.description: Young adult male gnome, British accent, anxious and hurried tone, a loyal guide dedicated to helping visitors navigate the maze and deeply worried about his village's safety.

characters.name: Kalron
characters.description: Adult male gnome, British accent, confused and distressed tone, a gnome who has become hopelessly lost in the village maze and fears being caught by Khazard's men.

characters.name: Khazard commander
characters.description: Adult male human, gruff military voice, hostile and authoritative tone, a commander in General Khazard's army who guards the stolen orb in the stronghold.

characters.name: Khazard warlord
characters.description: Middle-aged male human, deep menacing voice, aggressive and cruel tone, an undead warrior blessed by Khazard who carries immense contempt for both gnomes and humans.

characters.name: King Bolren
characters.description: Middle-aged male gnome, British accent, regal yet warm tone, a wise and protective king who deeply cares for his people but carries the burden of leadership during war and personal tragedy.

characters.name: Local Gnome
characters.description: Young male gnome, British accent, playful and whimsical tone, a carefree village resident who speaks with infectious enthusiasm and enjoys celebrations.

characters.name: Northern Local Gnomes
characters.description: Multiple young male gnomes, British accent, reverent and ceremonial tone, villagers participating in the sacred spirit tree ritual.

characters.name: Remsai
characters.description: Middle-aged male gnome, British accent, nervous and worried tone, a villager deeply concerned about the fate of the Tree Gnome Village and its sacred orbs.

characters.name: Southern Local Gnomes
characters.description: Multiple young male gnomes, British accent, reverent and ceremonial tone, villagers participating in the sacred spirit tree ritual.

characters.name: Tracker gnome 1
characters.description: Young adult male gnome, British accent, focused and serious tone, a brave scout who infiltrates enemy territory to gather intelligence despite the dangers of war.

characters.name: Tracker gnome 2
characters.description: Young adult male gnome, British accent, resilient and defiant tone, a courageous tracker who endured torture but never revealed information to the enemy.

characters.name: Tracker gnome 3
characters.description: Young adult male gnome, British accent, unhinged and manic tone, a tracker driven to madness by the horrors of war, speaks in riddles and sees demons everywhere.
